title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings.
description: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings.
OB: When clicking on "OK" and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes "www.actuate.com".
EB: The expected result is that the title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options".
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Click on "OK" in the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Actual result: The title becomes "www.actuate.com".
Expected result: The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options".
